subtitle: Summer berries served on meringue and brandied cream.

method.text: Preheat oven to 150°C. Line a baking tray with parchment paper to form a 20 cm circle.
Place the egg whites in a clean, dry and grease-free bowl. Whisk until stiff but not dry.
Whisk in 75 g of the sugar. Fold in the remaining sugar with the vanilla and cornflour.
Spoon half the meringue onto the baking tray.
Spoon the remainder into a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle. Pipe around the edge of the meringue.
Cook in the oven for 1 hour, or until crisp and dry. Remove from oven and leave to cool.
Whisk the cream, or creme fraiche, and brandy together until it forms peaks. Transfer the meringue to a serving plate and carefully spoon over the brandied cream.
Top the meringue with the prepared fruits. Serve well chilled.

title: Fruitful pavlova
